labels.label:
This flow is used to load Dunkin store data( CSV ) to DB. Algorithm is given below -
1. Read CSV from folder. 2. Converting CSV to JSON. 3. Converting JSON to SQL query. 4. Run those query.

processors.name: If failure happens data comes here
Convert each JSON file To a SQL query
Split a Json file to multiple JSON file
Convert each JSON file To a SQL query
Convert Store Data(CSV) to JSON and add Timestamp
